channel.title: Explanation of why runescape private servers arnet iligal
channel.description:
ok i was looking through websites and i found this
Although several attempts were made, RuneScape neither confirmed nor denied this was an illegal method of playing RuneScape. However, according to their TOS, as long as your private server does not connect/interfere with the actual server this 3rd party software is not breaking the real RuneScape TOS. Please use this information accordingly.
proof: [url=http://www.trap17.com/forums/private-runescape-server-t42351.html]http://www.trap17.com/forums/private-runescape-server-t42351.html[/url]

item.title: Explanation of why runescape private servers arnet iligal
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

[quote=“legend rene, post:2, topic:140371”]We all know theyre legal , we build them from their cache wich they leave on our harddisk unguarded.[/quote]if they give it to us it’s not illegal
